00072 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00073 {
00074         
00075 @private
00076         /* our chipmunk space! */
00077         cpSpace                 *_space;
00078         
00079         /* Internal devices */
00080         NSMutableArray  *_invocations;
00081 
00082         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00083         cpShape                 *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00084         
00085         cpBody                  *_staticBody;
00086         
00087         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00088         int             _steps;
00089         
00090         /* The dt used last within step */
00091         cpFloat _lastDt;
00092         
00093         /* If constant dt used, then this accumulates left over */
00094         cpFloat _timeAccumulator;
00095         
00096         /* hack to fix rehashing one static */
00097         BOOL _rehashNextStep;
00098         
00099         /* Options:
00100                 -cleanupBodyDependencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00101                 -constraintCleanupDelegate is the delegate that will be called when the above variable is true
00102                 -iterateStatic will call _iterateFunc on static shapes
00103                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00104                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00105                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00106         */
00107         BOOL                                                    _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00108         id<cpConstraintCleanupDelegate> _constraintCleanupDelegate;
00109         BOOL                                                    _iterateStatic;
00110         BOOL                                                    _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00111         cpSpaceHashIterator                             _iterateFunc;
00112         cpFloat                                                 _constantDt;
00113 }
00114
